text: Franco Rubartelli (born 1937), is an Italian photographer and director. Rubartelli was born in Florence, Italy in 1937. Rubartelli worked for magazines such as Vogue and Glamour, and helped to discover Veruschka which made his career, and they became lovers. ==Filmography== *Veruschka (1971) *Simplicio (1978) *Ya Koo (1985) ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Italian photographers Category:Fashion photographers Category:Living people
title: Franco Rubartelli
